int adcuAttacthCammerCallback ( int  index,
imageProcessCallback  callback 
)

! "brief attach the callback function for a specific camera .

Parameters
indexis the device id
callbackis the way that camera return image to app. this callback should process simple work. if you want to do some complicate works,please use another thread.
Return values
0success
-1something wrong happend.
void adcuCameraDeinit ( )

! "brief recycle the resource of the runtime enviorenment

int adcuCameraInit ( char *  cameraMask)

! "brief this function is to initialize the runtime enviorenment if the sdk. !

Parameters
cameraMaskis the bit map of camera. this mask should like this:"001100110011" which means the device which id is 2,3,6,7,10,11 will open for operation . plsease make sure all the required camaras are connected to the hardware correctly. the cameras are divided into 3 group, one camera group containe 4 cameras,if one camera of the required cameras in a group is not connected correctly, all the camera in the group will fail to capure images.
Return values
-1means failed
0means success.
